sectionText: Instructor: Serena Witzke Title: History of Comedy from Aristophanes to Modern Sitcoms Description: This semester will examine the heritage of Greek and Roman comedy (Aristophanes, Menander, Plautus, and Terence) in later comic playwrights Hrotsvit, Shakespeare, Moliere, Wilde, through musical comedies, and into the modern iteration of ancient comedy: the sit-com.
